===Etymology===
Uncertain. Here are a few possibilities:
* {{lang|zh|凊彩}}: {{zh-compound|*凊|*彩|cold|good}} — “not good enough” > “cannot choose”.
* {{lang|zh|靘彩}}: literally “dark or colourful” — it doesn't matter which you choose.
* {{lang|zh|請裁}}: shortened from {{lang|zh|[[請]][[汝]][[裁決]]}} (“please decide”); this is unlikely.
